name: Casa Fuente 808
additionalNotes:
New blend for 2012 added w/Rosado wrapper. Filler is tweaked Opus X. Sold only at Casa Fuente, Las Vegas and occasionally at Fuente events. Casa Fuente band, orange foot ribbon, Cello has  "Casa Fuente" stamped in gold.
